abstract: Ready for the holiday season? These clay clutches at Bergdorf Goodman should put you in the spirit of things.
snippet: Ready for the holiday season? These clay clutches at Bergdorf Goodman should put you in the spirit of things.
lead_paragraph: Ronnie Kirsch's polymer clay clutches stood out among the piles of diamonds and silk pajamas at Bergdorf Goodman's holiday preview. It was refreshing to see such a colorful clutch after a season of so many neutral handbags. Right on time for spring's pop fluorescents, the stripes are actually made of clay, then set in an oven like pottery. Kirsch, who holds a bachelor's in fine arts from the Rhode Island School of Design and worked in the design departments of Cartier and the Tiffany & Company before starting her own collection, treats the bags as she would works of art. We recommend doing the same.
